result.eng: Isn't this the best dictionary in the world?

result.eng: Two of the best teachers in Scotland.

result.eng: Czech beer is the best in the world.

result.eng: I can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.orig: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.html: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a biṫ a ṫaḃairt aċ déanfaiḋ mé mo ḋíċeallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.

result.eng: They have the best traditional music there.
result.ga: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansin

result.ponchtml: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den ċéad scoṫ acu ansinThey have the best traditional music there.

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: I hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.
result.ga: Is fuath liom a bheith ag siopadóireacht ach go n-éirí sé libh

result.ponchtml: Is fuaṫ liom a ḃeiṫ ag siopadóireaċt aċ go n-éirí sé liḃI hate to go shopping, but best of luck to you.

result.html: Beir bua agus beannachtMy best wishes to you!
result.ponchtml: Beir bua agus beannaċtMy best wishes to you!

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
